title: How to Balance Work and Study
text: Sometimes you just have to work. Rent is expensive in London and getting a job is the solution to a tight budget. However with the intense workload the LSE brings it can be hard to juggle both.

title: Staying in Dorms
text: Not everyone has the same on-campus living experience, but there are a few things you can do to make the most of dorm living. Here’s what to expect your first year living on campus and what you can do to have the best experience possible.

title: How societies shape your experience: my story
text: Societies are too often viewed by members as just a means to inoculate into wider networks, to develop their passions outside the classroom or to further their careers.
